website_summaries.verdict: This 2-pack yoga block and strap set from Live Infinitely includes 2 EVA foam blocks with soft beveled edges.
cons: These are 3 x 6 x 9-inch blocks, so not standard size
Smaller than blocks many studios use
Some find these not firm enough for their liking

customer_reviews.title: Small & Firm
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I don’t want to give less than four stars. These products are made very well. I thought the yoga blocks would be a little bit bigger. I didn’t realize there were more than one size so I wish that was listed in a more visible way. The strap is soft and comfortable, and I will use these blocks. I’m not returning them or anything. I just wish they were a little bit thicker but I do like how firm they are because it feels more like the earth instead of a squishy foam block like I have in class.
customer_reviews.author: Linzy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good set for personal practice, whether in your home or in a yoga studio or park. The strap is long enough for any flexibility level to enhance any stretch. The blocks are firm and very durable, not slippery so when I use them and my palms have been sweating, I am secure. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie F.

customer_reviews.title: and it’s perfect! The cork is sturdy and heavy
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with one of the blocks and contacted the company. They sent out a new set, and it’s perfect! The cork is sturdy and heavy, but doesn’t weigh your bag down. I also love the strap, which can double as a mat strap. I take both with me everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy and even came with a neat little how ...
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy and even came with a neat little how to paper and a "download" for instructional and health information. Arrived super fast and very pleased with my order
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Amos

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Lightweight and handy. The strap is a comfortable width made of nice strong cotton. Feels great in my hands. Comes with a handy half-page guide to some poses: a convenient quick one-glance overview for if you are new to stretching with yoga blocks and a strap. I should mention that these blocks are lighter and narrower than what I'm used to from the yoga studio, but for the price they are fantastic. Great for home use. The cat is also a big fan.
customer_reviews.author: Avocado Canvas

customer_reviews.title: Serves 3 Purposes Quite Well
customer_reviews.text: Great Light Weight and Sturdy Yoga Blocks. Does e everything I need it yo do and more. I use them for meditation to help me her centered as well as comfortable. I also, by chance discovered another use for them by using as a pillow when laying on floor. I tested it out under a flat pillow and WoW!!! NO More Tossing&Turning trying to find a comfortable position to sleep in. Works quite well in laying on your side and back positions. Woke Up with Zero Discomfort in Neck or Shoulder Area.
customer_reviews.author: MaLi415

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Blocks, useful strap
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Cork style blocks and am really enjoying them! Aesthetically beautiful and the texture feels nice on my hands. These blocks are used by multiple people of different age, size and level of fitness; all have expressed excitement over the prospect of using these blocks.
customer_reviews.author: BlK  C4t

customer_reviews.title: The set includes a short 6 foot strap
customer_reviews.text: This set comes with a short 6 foot strap. Read the listing carefully- the way the item description is worded you think you be receiving an 8ft strap but you have to order the 8 ft strap separately. PS the owner of company, Alicia, is very nice and stands by her product. I was sent a set for free because of the confusion on the listing.
customer_reviews.author: JaneL

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga blocks
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a hardcore yoga addict, but have been trying to up my yoga practice. I finally decided to get some yoga blocks and thought these made from cork would be great. So far, I've used them in 15-20 yoga workouts and they've been great. Very sturdy yet lightweight. These are great! The added yoga strap is is pretty awesome, too. Recommended buy.
customer_reviews.author: Donald C. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Every time my yoga instructor (on YouTube) takes out the blocks to start doing something, I look all around the room to try and find something to use. I'm so frustrated because all I can find is a pillow or something! I got fed up looked for real blocks on Amazon and this was definitely the best deal! They work great and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Post

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: These ARE smaller than the average block at stores, but perfect for me not needing bigger blocks as I'm pretty flexible and just wanted a couple blocks for a little extra support in my practice. I would say these are a perfect step down from the bigger blocks before one needs no blocks. Color and design are perfect, matches well with my black mat. Very masculine style for me. Strap is good quality as well. thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still fat!  Probably not this companies fault.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't use it yet. It will look nice next to my yoga mat I'll never use in my exercise room that is my living room. Not to create the image that one exercises or has exercised here but an honest attempt to remind one that exercise is an option at any time. So the pretty blue will at least be a stylish tripping hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Jannah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pieces
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my Yoga class at the community center. I haven't had a chance yet to use them because of the pandemic. I've tested them, though, at home and they seem sturdy and durable, hence the 3 stars. Perfect value!! Fit right into my budget. I also enjoy the different challenges received from the selling company. They keep me motivated to stay active! THANK YOU!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Regular necessity for yoga!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for morning yoga stretches, the band helps if you anchor it around a leg to assist you in stretching your legs with toes inward. Blocks are sturdy, well crafted, matte surface without a chance of slipping during your session.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Phan

customer_reviews.title: Good Yoga Blocks
customer_reviews.text: These blocks and stretch band worked perfectly for what I needed them to. My only complaint is the color varied a little bit from block to block so they didnt match when looked at closely. But other than that theyre great and I use the strap for bikram.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney McGagin

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the different options for colors. This was also one of the most affordable finds on blocks and a strap together. The strap is the perfect length; some I’ve found are way too long and hard to manage during practice. The blocks are a little firm, so if you use it a lot to rest your head on during practice I wouldn’t recommend them. But they are nice and stable if you need them for a twisting pose.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what it says it is, two yoga blocks and a strap. Never really needed them before as my studio, had the props, but now that my yoga is all online it’s been a lifesaver! Already ordered a second set of blocks & straps for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: sayshal

customer_reviews.title: You need yoga blocks?  Here they are.
customer_reviews.text: They’re yoga blocks. Like bacon, it’s hard to screw that up. I liked that they match my black chakra yoga mat. The strap wasn’t something my instructor said we would need but she was happy to show me a few poses with it which I think have helped me in my overall yoga practice.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi Rose

customer_reviews.title: They are okay
customer_reviews.text: The blocks are smaller in width than the other's that I have used, they don't feel as sturdy the larger blocks and they seem a bit dry, like they are going to disintegrate.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for home and gym use!
customer_reviews.text: Very good price for 2 yoga blocks and strap. Blocks are lighter than air but can hold a lot of weight for poses. Strap is well made. Purchased the 9x3x6 blocks instead of larger size and they are fine. Info sheet came with the items but you may want to look up some videos to see exactly how to use them. It is easy to hurt yourself when using the strap by pulling too hard and/incorrectly. I liked the matching colors of strap and blocks. Now I don't have to join the rush for props at the beginning of yoga class!
customer_reviews.author: Wishful Thinking

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what my wife wanted
customer_reviews.text: My wife was going to buy at a big box store but remembered I had Amazon Prime and 2 days later she had exactly what she wanted and we saved 30% she is happy with the product as well!!!
customer_reviews.author: James Roebuck

customer_reviews.title: Blocks are a bit smaller than standard yoga blocks.  Otherwise good product.
customer_reviews.text: The product is a good value and arrived quickly. The yoga blocks are not quite a thick as the ones at my studio, which was disappointing. That said, they work fine. If I buy again, I'll go for studier cork blocks.
customer_reviews.author: RealReviewByActualPerson

customer_reviews.title: I’m Ready Now
customer_reviews.text: The strap and blocks come with an illustrated guide to get beginners like me started on the path to mental, spiritual, and physical wellness. I’m ready to begin the journey.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Warnell

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: Great products. I just got the products and have to say I haven't used them in a practice, but from the ones I've used in classes, I can tell that they will be good and what I need.. I like the color too.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Mo Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not standard size
customer_reviews.text: Be aware if purchasing - these are not the standard sizes you'll find in studios.
customer_reviews.author: Cara D.

customer_reviews.title: Just like the ones at my yoga studio
customer_reviews.text: With Covid 19 I have been practicing yoga at home instead of the yoga studio so needed to order some blocks and a strap. Could not be happier with these. Thank you so much for the great value and timely delivery especially during these times.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A.

customer_reviews.title: Good, basic yoga blocks and strap. Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a set of basic 4" yoga blocks and a yoga strap without paying a lot for them, and this set is a very good one! I am fairly new to yoga, so this set is great for someone who is just starting out with yoga.
customer_reviews.author: DukeGal19

customer_reviews.title: Just do it!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit nervous about buying this product but I thought the blocks wouldn't be able to help. I am so happy I was wrong. The blocks along with the strap makes me feel like a true yogi
customer_reviews.author: Kita Marie

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The blocks are great they improve my yoga practice I love the color and the quality! My order arrived ahead of schedule and this company emailed me several times to update me on how I can track my order while I wait. They also included photos of suggested poses which is so helpful
customer_reviews.author: dyd

customer_reviews.title: Best Customer Service EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I’m SO GLAD I decided to go for this product! The design and color are just as pictured on the site. The texture is nice as well and something I value and I’ve experienced with this brand is their customer service. They’ve followed up with me before and after the arrival of my items and that’s something that not all brands do. Do not think twice and get this item, it’s worth every cent!
customer_reviews.author: Lucero Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Good, cheap props
customer_reviews.text: Everyone doing Pilates and yoga needs a strap and blocks. These tools are great. I find them very helpful and more than adequate for my home practice.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley C Koltnow

customer_reviews.title: Great set for a newbie
customer_reviews.text: I've just started doing yoga more regularly and these foam blocks and stretching belt are nice sturdy components to help with some of the moves.
customer_reviews.author: AFrisby

customer_reviews.title: Blocks are small and not stable for side stacking
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you read the dimensions on the blocks cause these are much smaller than I am used to. I personally wish they were a couple inches wider so when you are doing poses while the blocks are on their sides there was more stability.
customer_reviews.author: iisstill

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could write 2 reviews...
customer_reviews.text: It would be great if I could leave one review for the yoga blocks and one for the strap. The strap is great - very sturdy. The blocks, however, are considerably narrower than any other blocks I've used before. This makes them harder to balance with, and uncomfortable when using them in poses like bridge and legs up the wall.
customer_reviews.author: dprowse

customer_reviews.title: Well made at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I added this set to my daily yoga practice and I love it. I can feel myself becoming more flexible and strong. I only wish I had bought it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: J. Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Lovely set.
customer_reviews.text: These yoga blocks are not only beautiful but functional. They have made some of my yoga exercises so much more comfortable. They are made really well and I love the set.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny H

customer_reviews.title: serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: The blocks are sturdy work great for yoga and helps me get better. It not much product to review it does just what it's suppose to. Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: eviltwin

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the chance to use yet, but they look sturdy and perfect for when I get back into yoga. .......which will hopefully be soon because I'm getting fat.
customer_reviews.author: Tosh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: I really love my 2 cork yoga blocks. I like the feel of it and the fact that they are not slippery when my hands get sweaty. The strap is a good length, more cotton than nylon, which I really like. I'm very happy with my purchase from that company. Nice quality, nice price!
customer_reviews.author: Dey17

customer_reviews.title: Blocks perfect for yoga.
customer_reviews.text: Great blocks for my yoga time. I love the color of my blocks. It is an inspiring color. Thank you for your follow up.
customer_reviews.author: vonnie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money no regrets.
customer_reviews.text: Love my yoga set. Makes it so much easier for me to do a yoga. I have an autoimmune disorder and my joints hurts all the time this set makes it easier for me to move my legs. Glad I made this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for yin yoga
customer_reviews.text: These blocks work great for yin yoga, and they work great as a seat during meditation. They are thinner then I thought they would be, but that actually turned out to be a blessing because the ones I bought before were not good for seated poses. They have no chemical smell at all and are very soft yet firm. Comfy and perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are slightly thinner than the ones I'm used to using, but look nice, are well-formed, and seem like they'll stand the test of time. The strap is a strap--fairly unexciting. However, it, too, seems well made, well sewn. and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Nate W

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Just what i needed to start my journey into Yoga. I'm very please with the quality. And the price was great! I even recommended this item to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: TeresaH

customer_reviews.title: Yoga Mat
customer_reviews.text: I needed the extra thickness due to a knee replacement. Works perfectly. And I like the bright color!
customer_reviews.author: Nanette Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great package deal
customer_reviews.text: Amazing deal for the price. Glad we purchased this rather than the super expensive blocks that Peloton offers!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S.

customer_reviews.title: Light and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Light and sturdy blocks. The size right for a easy handling. Strap is not too long or too short
customer_reviews.author: ep

customer_reviews.title: blocks/strap
customer_reviews.text: as advertised good for price, stable and steady for hands stands. not too hard for yin back bend and hero's pose,
customer_reviews.author: JUDI Z

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Use them often
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Use them often. Straight forward, what you see is what you get. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: D Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love them. Only used a couple times so far, but the blocks feel really sturdy yet comfortable. The strap has been great as well. I think these things will last me quite a while. They are a gorgeous color, I love to use them!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Struck

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Really love the color. I could have opted for a longer strap but this one is a good size too seeing that there isn’t any excess dangling off to the side when I’m doing my stretches. Great product, definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: I like the strap too
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for purple blocks and there they were. I like the strap too. It is longer than most.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Foam blocks are great
customer_reviews.text: I got the blocks and strap to allow me to do yoga at home. The blocks are great. However the strap is only 6 ft. and too short to be of any use to me. I recommend that in the future you put an 8 ft strap in this package.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret S.

customer_reviews.title: ♡♡♡♡♡
customer_reviews.text: Love this set and the starter stretch moves given with it. Inspired to get flexible and healthy post baby again!
customer_reviews.author: Alanna

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and easy to use! It comes with a great instructional video as well as pictures for beginners. The strap is strong and long enough to fold.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these sets and absolutely love them, good quality, fun colors and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good product, brought another set already.
customer_reviews.text: Very good value. Provide the function of blocks good enough. Well worth the bucks!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: excelent
customer_reviews.text: Im a new at yoga and so this little package really helps!! very well made got the product on time
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I purchased this set, it’s so handy for yoga. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: BAH Walker

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and functional and sturdy yoga blocks and straps
customer_reviews.text: I take a Yin yoga class once a week and love it so much that I wanted the same things at home to do it whenever I want to.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Martin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR YOGA PRACTICE
customer_reviews.text: I love these yoga blocks and yoga strap set. The yoga blocks are the normal height and width you can find anywhere. The yoga strap is long enough to really get into a deep stretch. I ordered the dark gray color, its a beautiful color. It is a very dark gray, almost looks like the black set. Just a heads up.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Made my Yoga experience more enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: I am fairly new to Yoga, but so far the blocks and belt have been helpful as I am not the most flexible person. They have helped my Yoga experience to be more enjoyable because I am not having to struggle so much in certain moves.
customer_reviews.author: Dody

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Set
customer_reviews.text: This set has helped me with my New Years resolution! I started the practice and I’m loving it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Works Well For Senior Citizen
customer_reviews.text: This is used by my wife, who, at 76 years old, wants to improve her balance. She rates it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Russ K. Saito

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set, size and color
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for stretching. The blocks are comfortable to use and the belt is good for stretching.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lolli

customer_reviews.title: Cork blocks and strap
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the cork blocks and strap. Blocks seem very sturdy. The strap is really thin though and twists up cuts into your skin a little. I gave them 2 stars because the strap was the main thing I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Brendon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nicely packaged, cool color.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used these once so far, but they seem to be good quality at a good price. Can't tell the durability yet.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy E. in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got these a while back and I still use them every day. Great purchase. Will definitely purchase from this brand again in the future. The material for both pieces of the product are very sturdy and will hold, I promise!!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product! The blocks and strap seem to be very sturdy and are easy to grip even with sweaty yoga hands.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to see that this product was exactly as described, including the color (which doesn't always happen with online ordering) It has improved my yoga practice and I would definitely order again and will be ordering other products as I need them.
customer_reviews.author: MelT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It was a great gift, thank you for fast service. AAA+++
customer_reviews.author: P. Spring

customer_reviews.title: Decent Bargain Blocks
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used larger cork blocks in the studio (very new to yoga). These compact, lightweight blocks will do as a backup. They’re fine for the price. The strap is equivalent to what’s in the studio.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Marsupi

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I am completely satisfied with this purchase. The quality is good, and the color is delightful!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Lipner-johnson

customer_reviews.title: 100% must buy
customer_reviews.text: I’ll keep this short and sweet. Great price! Amazing quality! Has changed my yoga flow for the better. Will be shopping from here again
customer_reviews.author: nili

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy enough for support, soft enough for comfort, and well made. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Great balance support.
customer_reviews.text: Great help with balance and stability. Definitely helped me with my handstand and back bends.
customer_reviews.author: Deserae

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love having my own blocks and straps. Don't like using ones others have used.
customer_reviews.author: Naneki C

customer_reviews.title: "Off-label" use
customer_reviews.text: A physical therapist recommended an exercise that involved separating legs with a yoga block when doing sit-and-stand-and-sit exercises in order to strengthen seldom-used muscles. One of these blocks, attached to a leg by the strap, is exactly what is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Demanding Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to add for my home workouts!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to add for my home workouts! Super sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Mariji

customer_reviews.title: The blocks work for me well, but the strap is too short.
customer_reviews.text: The block works well. However, the length of the strap I got is just about 5 feet. (much shorter than 6 feet) It is different with the description and can't use for yoga exercise well.
customer_reviews.author: Wei T.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my yoga practice!
customer_reviews.text: I am fairly new to yoga and have recently started a daily practice at home. These blocks and strap are a perfect addition! They help me get into positions I normally couldn't and get the strap helps me get that extra stretch in the morning! They are a great quality and pretty enough to put out with the rest of my gear. Love them! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These blocks and strap are very good quality. Thank you for improving my practice. Namaste.
customer_reviews.author: Messy728

customer_reviews.title: quality products and prompt service
customer_reviews.text: I love my yoga blocks! I'm finding so many ways to use them (try searching #yogablocks on instagram and you'll find plenty!) Both the blocks and strap are great quality. I highly recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Alison Strieker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are just what I needed to be active in my online pilates class.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Euler

customer_reviews.title: So dar holding up and i like the fact that they are made of cork and ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this. So dar holding up and i like the fact that they are made of cork and no foam.
customer_reviews.author: SANTHOSHKUMAR K.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to a good mat for those of us who need some help with our yoga
customer_reviews.author: M. H. Hinkley

customer_reviews.title: The blocks are strong and the colors perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am completely satisfied with the blocks and strap. Love the color. Thank you for a great product. Darcy.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer!!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the 2 blocks and a strap package. Everything came as expected--good quality and works well!
customer_reviews.author: jambagroov

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and helped me with my workouts. Anyone just trying yoga for the first time should try some blocks like these to help you ease into it. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Dexter Coffee

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this set for my daughter as a valentines gift who does yoga on a daily basis. Shes only had the set for 1 workout since i just gave it to her yesterday but she said it made a huge difference in her workout. The package arrived on time and came with instructions and a website she could use . i would highly recommend this product as it is a sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Retta

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love my blocks and ring strap. They are of great quality. Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga block and strap set
customer_reviews.text: Great yoga block and strap set. The yoga block is a little shorter than most, but that's exactly what I wanted. Fun colors too!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: Loved the high quality blocks, easy to keep clean, the strap works perfectly and is easy to use. I'm a beginner so quality and ease of use help me stay motivated to continue and expand my yoga horizons!
customer_reviews.author: GE

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: The blocks are great, lightweight and just the right size. They feel smooth and durable. The strap also has a softer feel, though I’m wondering how long it will last. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Magyar

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality blocks and belt. Love the color. Nice to have matching color equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my home yoga between classes. Beautiful color.
customer_reviews.author: Dianem3

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and excellent quality. Will be buying more sets as gifts to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Familia account

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: This has lasted me quite a long time and still like new.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Heavy-duty cork
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and exactly what I wanted for yoga. I was surprised at the weight as opposed to foam. Loving these blocks!
customer_reviews.author: BadAnthropologist

customer_reviews.title: Quality Yoga Blocks and Strap
customer_reviews.text: I like the weight, feel, and texture of the yoga blocks and strap. The materials are of good quality. I choose the gray color which is soothing to the eye during practice.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Baskin

product_meta.title: Premium Yoga Blocks & Metal D Ring Strap Yogi Set (3PC) 2 Pack High Density EVA Foam Blocks to Support & Deepen Poses, Improve Strength, Flexibility & Balance - Lightweight, Odor & Moisture Resistant
feature_bullets: Get everything you need to improve your stretches and take your yoga to the next level. Whether you’re new or a seasoned veteran this set will deepen your poses and increase your flexibility daily!
This set by Live Infinitely includes 2- 3”x 6” x 9” EVA foam blocks with easy grip beveled edges and 1- 6’ long soft cotton strap with premium metal D-rings.
The blocks are made from EVA foam making them odor and moisture resistant while still only weighing 7 ounces each
Perfect for on-the-go, in the studio, or at home use. Easily deepen and elongate your stretches while keeping your posture spot on!
Backed with the Live Infinitely 1 Year unlimited warranty. If you’re not thrilled, simply contact our customer service team and know that you will receive unmatched personal assistance.
